LanguageData.BuildPumpShotgun.label: 제작 : 래밍턴 870 샷건
LanguageData.BuildPumpShotgun.description: Builds an ancient 샷건 for personal defence.\n구경 : 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildM37A2_USCM.label: 제작 : M37A2 펌프식 샷건
LanguageData.BuildM37A2_USCM.description: The M37A2 펌프식 샷건 which also known as the M37A2 Combat 샷건, is a pump-action combat 샷건.\n구경 : 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildStrikerShotgun.label: 제작 : 스트라이커 샷건
LanguageData.BuildStrikerShotgun.description: Builds a 스트라이커 샷건, a cheap-looking semi-automatic 샷건. Has a high fire rate and high damage output, but low range.\n구경 : 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildTacticalShotgun.label: 제작 : M45 전술 샷건
LanguageData.BuildTacticalShotgun.description: Builds the M45 전술 샷건, a 샷건 used by the United Nations Space Command Army. Holds 8 shells with a quick fire rate but low range.\n구경 : 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildAA12AutoShotgun.label: 제작 : 에치스 돌격 AA-12 샷건
LanguageData.BuildAA12AutoShotgun.description: Builds an 에치스 돌격 AA-12, an automatic 샷건 with almost no recoil. Has burst fire, is moderately accurate at just under 소총 range and has high damage output.\n구경 : 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildTacticalAutoshotgun.label: 제작 : M90 CAWS 자동 샷건
LanguageData.BuildTacticalAutoshotgun.description: Builds the M90 Close Assault Weapon 시스템 (M90 CAWS). It is the UNSC's primary 샷건 and is one of the most effective close range infantry weapons used by front line forces.\n구경 : 12 Gauge
LanguageData.BuildTacticalAutoshotgun.jobString: 제작 중 : M90 CAWS 자동 샷건.
